Comment: Any senator who agrees with anything at all that Ron Wyden proposes to the Senate should have their heads examined. This means you Murkowski, McConnell and Collins.
Author: social_dinosaur

Comment: There's a libertarian victory in the way Dems have 1000% of their minds wrapped around hating Trump.  Smallgov does not win by electing a designated smallgov party, it wins by government not doing anything that is "productive" *from a government point of view.* Deadlock is a win, filibuster is a win, circular holding pattern is a win, debate that leads to nothing but additional debate is a win.  Every attack they point at the giant orange battle robot is not pointed at regular working people. ***They could have been inventing new taxes with the entire years they wasted on this shitshow.***
Author: D_Ethan_Bones
